lowcode.develop.manualwebhookConfigWizar: You cannot start with a number, and only [a-zA-Z0-9{}_/ [].] characters are allowed.
API Calls
Action
An action can be used to invoke operations of an existing connector.
Select from list
Connector
A connector can be used to integrate with external applications.
Other
A custom statement can be used to write a single or a multiline code snippet that is not supported by the low code diagram.
A data mapping statement can be used to create an object using several other variables.
ForEach
A foreach statement is a control flow statement that can be used to iterate over a list of items.
If
An if statement allows you to specifiy two blocks of logical components so that the system can decide which block to execute based on whether the provided condition is true or false.
Log
Worker

A log statement logs an event with an information statement or an error that occurs in a service or an integration. If the event has not yet occured, you can view the logs from the 'Run & Test' console . If the event has occured, you can view the logs from the Observability page.
A worker allows to execute code in parallel with function's default worker and other named workers.
A send allows to send data from one worker to another.
A receive allows to receive data from other workers.
A wait allows worker to wait for another worker and get the return value of it.
A flush allows the worker to wait until all the send messages are consumed by the target workers.
Respond
An HTTP connector can be used to integrate with external applications
A respond statement sends the response of a service back to the client.
Return
A return statement stops executing the current path or returns a value back to the caller.
Search
Statements
Variable
A variable statement holds a value of a specific data type (string, integer, etc.,) so that it can be used later in the logical process of the service/integration.
While
HTTP
A while statement executes a block of statements in a loop as long as the specified condition is true.
